Was not possible to delete the sensor, please try again or consult to your administrator

messages.danger: There was an error when save settings

loginPage.description: JARVIS makes it easy to get real-time notifications on your Android devices. JARVIS as server monitoring software is designed to make sure that a server is active,  healthy, and responding to requests appropriately. Can be used as an advanced server monitoring software which lets you check both basic server uptime and detailed usage statistics on all types of servers, including: Web, Databases, Mail, Hardware Resources and Application Status.
loginPage.messageSignup: Create an account is fast, easy and free get started today!

login.failed: An error occurred while attempting connect to the server.

left.title: REST API
left.description: If you want to implement your own sensor application or your own client web application, review the API which allow you send messages, review the data generated and of course know how to extend the web services. The API is simple, it's documented with a focus on provide an easy integration with your web App.

center.title: Mobile Application
center.description: JARVIS mobile allow you to keep connected to JARVIS services, so you can receive all the alerts and notifications generated in real time, you can install the application on many mobile devices with Android platform.

right.title: Sensor Application
right.description: The Sensor application is build using the Java language programming, so can run on every kind of operative system that has support to Java, just need to configure the basic parameters and start to generate data.
